section.title: Installation
section.para: The .NET Solution: Luthetus.Tutorials.sln, was made by following steps described here. So, the completed result can be found there.

listitem.para: In MainLayout.razor render the <Luthetus.Common.RazorLib.Installations.Displays.LuthetusCommonInitializer /> and the <Luthetus.TextEditor.RazorLib.Installations.Displays.LuthetusTextEditorInitializer /> Blazor components

section.title: Steps
section.para: Use your preferred way to install NuGet Packages to install Luthetus.TextEditor.
The nuget.org link to the NuGet Package is here: https://www.nuget.org/packages/Luthetus.TextEditor
Go to the file that you register your services and add the following lines of C# code.
Go to the file that you reference CSS files from and add the following CSS references.
Go to the file that you reference JavaScript files from and add the following JavaScript reference below the Blazor framework JavaScript reference

listitem.para: In App.razor add the following towards the top of the file:

literallayout.computeroutput:
<Fluxor.Blazor.Web.StoreInitializer />
<!-- The Luthetus components here, can be moved wherever. Preferably, these are in one's LayoutComponentBase. As here they cannot receive any cascading css. --> <Luthetus.Common.RazorLib.Installations.Displays.LuthetusCommonInitializer /> <Luthetus.TextEditor.RazorLib.Installations.Displays.LuthetusTextEditorInitializer />

blockquote.para: NOTE: Luthetus repositories use the state management library named Fluxor (github link).
